projects.name: Recipe Page
projects.description: Recipe website developed as part of The Odin Project, using basic HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Event Page
projects.description: Event page developed as part of the Introduction to web development course, using intermediate HTML and CSS knowledge.

projects.name: Clinic Database System
projects.description: Design a conceptual and a logical EER model for a clinic system, as well as retrieve data by running queries, developed as part of the Database Management System course.

projects.name: Vinyl Collection
projects.description: Vinyl collection website developed as part of the Introduction to Full Stack course, developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JSON.

projects.name: College Application
projects.description: The project College Application is a console app developed using C#. It focuses on the use of Object Oriented Programming, such as creating classes, working with aggregation, 2D arrays, and file handling.

projects.name: Landing Page
projects.description: This landing page project was developed using HTML, CSS, specially the flexbox knowledge, as part of The Odin Project.
